FO.Label: Average interest rate

FO.Name: unit_capex
FO.Label: Unit capital cost (Default value specific to 2000 m3/day capacity; adjusted internally for capacity unless the user introduces a different cost)

FO.Name: labor

FO.Name: coh
FO.Label: Unit cost of heat from fossil fuel (LCOH)

FO.Name: solar_coh
FO.Label: Unit cost of heat from solar field (LCOH) (Input value to overwrite LCOH calculated from solar field)

FO.Name: cost_storage

FO.Section: LCOW calculation inputs

FO.Name: SEEC

FO.Label: Specific thermal energy consumption
